definition: a conventional expression of greeting or farewell
details:
noun
- a conventional expression of greeting or farewell
= synonyms: good morning
- the earliest period
= synonyms: dawn
- the time period between dawn and noon
= example: the time period between dawn and noon
= synonyms: morn
- the first light of day
= synonyms: dawn, sunrise, aurora, dawning, first light, daybreak, break of day, break of the day, dayspring, sunup, cockcrow
